message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes with advanced features and exceptional quality that we believe will exceed your expectations. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer of $15000 for this product. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope you'll find this proposal attractive.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Can you meet me at that price or lower?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your perspective and would like to make a counterproposal. Given the value and quality of the product, I am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer is $9500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations while still reflecting the true value of the item.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $8500 for the product? I'm really interested in it, but I need to make sure it fits within my means.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, and I'm glad to hear that you're still interested in the product. After considering your offer, I am willing to go down to $9000 for the product. I hope this price point will be more suitable for your budget while still ensuring a fair return for us.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $8200, but I need to get as close to $8000 as possible. Can you meet me at $8200?

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, and I'm willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer is $8750 for the product. I hope this price point is acceptable for you while still reflecting the value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. Can you consider $8375 for the product?

Thank you for your patience and understanding, Bob. I'm glad we could come closer to a mutually beneficial agreement. My final counteroffer is $8500 for the product. I hope this price reflects both the value of the product and your budgetary considerations.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $8250, but I really need to get as close to $8000 as possible. Can you meet me at $8250 or lower?
